allplan.smartparts: SmartParts allow easy and fast scripting of complex geometries and therefore suit best for repetitive static elements within the project.
allplan.pythonparts: PythonParts built upon the scripting language Python within Allplan are best for parametric objects and automatization of easy recurring tasks.
allplan.allplanapi: NOI Allplan API is the most flexible and performant interface for creating reliable Add-Ons within Allplan. This interface gives direct access to the allplan internals opening up virtually unlimited application options.
